name: HyperSound X100 Wireless Noise-Canceling Headphones
description: Immerse yourself in crystal-clear sound with the HyperSound X100 Wireless Noise-Canceling Headphones. Designed for comfort and durability, these headphones feature advanced noise-canceling technology, Bluetooth 5.3 connectivity, and up to 30 hours of battery life on a single charge. Perfect for travel, work, or leisure, the X100 delivers rich bass and crisp highs for an unparalleled listening experience.
